scripts.test-napi: zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseFast && zbind test/addon.node test/lib.ts && ./run test
scripts.test-wasm: zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseSmall -Dtarget=wasm32-wasi && zbind test/addon.wasm test/lib.ts && ./run test
scripts.test: ./run src/patch && tsc -p src && npm run test-napi && npm run test-wasm
